verses.verse: <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the children of <S%H1121>Ammon,<s%> and prophesy against <S%H5012>them:<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> the children of <S%H1121>Ammon,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> Because you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> against my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> when it was <S%H2490>profaned;<s%> and against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when it was made <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> when they <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity:<s%>

<S%H5414>therefore,<s%> behold, I will deliver you to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> for a <S%H4181>possession,<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>set<s%> their <S%H2918>encampments<s%> in <S%H5414>you,<s%> and make their <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> in <S%H398>you;<s%> they shall eat your <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> a <S%H5116>stable<s%> for <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and the children of <S%H1121>Ammon<s%> a resting <S%H4769>place<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Because you have <S%H4222>clapped<s%> your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H7554>stamped<s%> with the <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> with all the <S%H7589>despite<s%> of your <S%H5315>soul<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

<S%H5186>therefore,<s%> behold, I have stretched out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H5414>you,<s%> and will deliver you for a <S%H957>spoil<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and I will cut you <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and I will cause you to <S%H6>perish<s%> out of the <S%H776>countries:<s%> I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3045>you;<s%> and you shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1004>Behold,<s%> the house of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is like all the <S%H1471>nations;<s%>

<S%H6605>therefore,<s%> behold, I will open the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> from his <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are on his <S%H7097>frontiers,<s%> the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of the <S%H776>country,<s%> Beth <S%H1020>Jeshimoth,<s%> Baal <S%H1186>Meon,<s%> and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%>

to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east,<s%> to go against the children of <S%H1121>Ammon;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them for a <S%H4181>possession,<s%> that the children of <S%H1121>Ammon<s%> may not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
and I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because <S%H123>Edom<s%> has <S%H6213>dealt<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by <S%H5358>taking<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and has <S%H816>greatly<s%> <S%H816>offended,<s%> and revenged himself on <S%H5358>them;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal<s%> from <S%H5414>it;<s%> and I will make it <S%H2723>desolate<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman;<s%> even to <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on <S%H123>Edom<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they shall <S%H6213>do<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%> according to my <S%H639>anger<s%> and according to my <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H5360>revenge,<s%> and have <S%H5358>taken<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> with <S%H7589>despite<s%> of <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> with <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H342>enmity;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5186>Behold,<s%> I will stretch out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3774>Cherethites,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>coast.<s%>

I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them with <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> my vengeance on <S%H5360>them.<s%>
